_description: Introductory invocation (following 2040) to Ayenbite of Inwyt — two couplets

BLAru57.Transcription:
Lhord iesu almiȝti kyngÞet madest and lokest alle
                    þyngMe þet am þi makyngto þine blisse me þou bryng
